title: Factors that contribute to population momentum

content.question: In a human population, the population momentum effect is most likely to occur in cases in which a large percent of people in the population are in which age-group?

choices.label: Between thirty and forty-four years old
Between forty-five and fifty-four years old
Between fifty-five and sixty years old

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
